name: Submersible Blue Day
text: (Quick Effect): You can banish this face-up card until the End Phase and target 1 banished "Submersible" monster, except "Submersible Blue Day"; Special Summon it. f this card is Special Summoned by the effect of another "Submersible" card: You can send 1 "Submersible" card from your Deck to your GY. You cannot activate this effect of "Submersible Blue Day" until your next Standby Phase.
